description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. You and a friend (optional) play as Santa Clause and Stumpy in rocket powered sleighs on a quest for revenge. Fly everywhere from the deserts of Afghanistan to the snowy mountains of Siberia, using ten different power-ups to wreck havoc on armies of terrorists, mutant plants, space aliens and much more. Despite its simple appearance, this game is quite complex and challenging. You'll die... a lot.
